biotools.summary: This package contains two main functions. The first is fdr.ma which takes normalized expression data array, experimental design and computes adjusted p-values. It returns the fdr adjusted p-values and plots. The second is fdr.gui() which creates a simple graphic user interface to access fdr.ma.

bioschemas.name: fdrame
bioschemas.summary: This package contains two main functions. The first is fdr.ma which takes normalized expression data array, experimental design and computes adjusted p-values. It returns the fdr adjusted p-values and plots. The second is fdr.gui() which creates a simple graphic user interface to access fdr.ma.
